BY ADVS.SRI.P.V.ANILKUMAR SMT .D.SARITHA SMT .J.RAJI RESPONDENT (S) /STATE & DEFACTO COMPLAINANT: 1.STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR,HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM- 682031. 2. PADMAKUMAR, S/O.RAVEENDRAN NAIR,AGED 39 YEARS,APPLE ASSOCIATES, BHAVANA ROAD , KANNADIKKADU ,MARADU, POONITHURA VILLAGE, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT-682304. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: TS Eel fue his ca B Tae P 2018/KER/283 Cr1.MC.No. 8884 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' ANNEXURES ANNEXURE AL COPY OF FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 835/08 OF PALARIVATTM POLICE STATION SUBMITTED BEFORE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-IX , ERNAKULAM. ANNEXURE A2 ORIGINAL OF THE AFFIDAVIT FILED BY THE DEFACTO COMPLAINANT. RESPONDENT (S)' ANNEXURES - NIL /TRUE COPY/ PS TO JUDGE TS eee 2018/KER/283 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 4" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioners are the accused in CC No.17/2016 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-IX, Ernakulam, which has arisen from Crime No.835/2008 of Palarivattom Police Station for the offences punishable under Sections 341, 323 and 294(b) read with Section 34 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably settled between the petitioners and the de_ facto complainant, who is the 2"? respondent herein. 3. The 2 respondent has filed Annexure-A2 affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between him and the petitioners and presently, he has no complaints against the petitioners. No purpose would be served in proceeding with the matter further. Matters being so, all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC Pe apesoeiae es 2018/KER/283 Crl.M.C.8884/2017 :2: No.17/2016 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-IX, Ernakulam, which has arisen from Crime No.835/2008 of Palarivattom Police Station, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.17/2016 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-IX, Ernakulam, which has arisen from Crime No.835/2008 of Palarivattom Police Station, are quashed. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/04/01 // True Copy // PS to Judge
